subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Brazil dropped to its lowest FIFA ranking, No. 22, a year before hosting the World Cup, while the United States moved up one spot to No. 28.
snippet: Brazil dropped to its lowest FIFA ranking, No. 22, a year before hosting the World Cup, while the United States moved up one spot to No. 28.
